Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_EXPLAN_01.Text: Quickly and easily restore all your party members to full health.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_EXPLAN_02.Text: Restore all your party members to full health as efficiently as possible.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_EXPLAN_04.Text: Choose the order your party members stand in.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_EXPLAN_05.Text: Choose the tactics your party will use in battle.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_EXPLAN_06.Text: View advice and information that will help you on your quest.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_EXPLAN_07.Text: View various statistics and information about your adventure so far.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_EXPLAN_09.Text: End your adventure for now and return to the title screen.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_EXPLAN_10.Text: End your adventure, without creating a quick save log, and return to the title screen.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_EXPLAN_11.Text: Adjust a variety of in-game options. (Applies to all adventure logs.)

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_TACTICSEXPLAN_01.Text: Don't fret about MP, just give the enemy what for!

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_TACTICSEXPLAN_02.Text: Strike a careful balance between offence and defence.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_TACTICSEXPLAN_03.Text: Keep a keen eye on your allies' health, and ensure that nobody dies.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_TACTICSEXPLAN_04.Text: Conserve valuable conjuring power by avoiding all spells and abilities.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_TACTICSEXPLAN_05.Text: Leave the hard work to the hero and focus on supporting and healing the party.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_TACTICSEXPLAN_06.Text: Instead of following a preset strategy, allow the hero to dictate what everyone does each turn.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_011.Text: Adjust the speed of monster arena battles.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_022.Text: Adjust the distance of the camera.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_023.Text: Choose whether or not the minimap is displayed.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_024.Text: Adjust the size of the area displayed by the minimap when exploring the world map.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_025.Text: Choose whether to prioritise frame rate or graphics.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_031.Text: Adjust the volume of the music.
Adjust the volume of the environmental sounds.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_032.Text: Adjust the volume of the sound effects.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_033.Text: Adjust the volume of the characters' voices.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_034.Text: Choose whether to advance the action manually or automatically in voiced cutscenes.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_036.Text: Choose whether or not to display help text.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_037.Text: Choose whether or not to display the objective marker.
For those who want to breeze through battles and savour the story. Switch to this difficulty if you find the going's got too tough!
For those who want a fair challenge. If you're not sure which difficulty's for you, give this one a try!
For those who want a real challenge. You'll face stronger foes, and earn fewer experience points and gold coins to boot.
Adjust how you make your character run.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_038.Text: Choose the speed at which messages are displayed.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_056.Text: Choose what language the text is displayed in. Any changes made will affect all adventure logs.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_057.Text: Choose what language the characters speak in. Any changes made will affect all adventure logs.
Adjust how the game displays on your monitor.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_058.Text: Adjust a range of graphical options.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGITEMEXPLAN_059.Text: Adjust mouse settings and game behaviour during periods of inactivity.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGPCITEMEXPLAN_0.Text: Adjust the type of window in which the game is displayed.
Choose whether or not to enable vertical synchronisation.
Choose a predetermined set of values for all graphical options.
Adjust the size of the area that is covered by shadows.
Adjust how smooth the edges of objects appear.
Adjust the level of detail in textures.
Choose how closely to match the output resolution to your display resolution.
Adjust how realistically light and shadow are represented.
Choose whether or not to blur distant objects/scenery.
Choose whether or not to always keep the mouse cursor within the game window.
Choose whether or not to play audio during periods of inactivity.
Choose whether or not to allow gamepad input during periods of inactivity.

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGKEYCONFIG_CANC.Text: Are you sure you want to close the menu without confirming your changes?

Txt_FieldMenu_Misc_SETTINGKEYCONFIG_DUPL.Text: Multiple functions have been mapped to the same key. Please fix this and confirm your settings.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_ConfirmSorting.Text: Place all non-essential items in the bag?

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_FinishSorting.Text: All non-essential items have been placed in the bag.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_NoItem.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> doesn't have any items or equipment.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_Mantan_Fail.Text: Nothing happens<--->everyone's as fit as a fiddle already!

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_AlmostMantan_Fail.Text: Nothing happens<--->everyone's almost at full health anyway!

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_Mantan_FailMagic.Text: But the magic couldn't be cast!

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_HandoverSelect.Text: Who do you want to transfer <DefSgl_I_NAME> to?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_HandoverResult_05.Text: {LEADER} takes <DefSgl_ACTOR>'s <Sgl_I_NAME>, and puts <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> in with <DefSgl_TARGET>'s belongings.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_HandoverResult_06.Text: {LEADER} takes <DefSgl_ACTOR>'s <Sgl_I_NAME>, and puts <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> in with <DefSgl_ACTOR>'s belongings.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_HandoverResult_12.Text: {LEADER} takes <DefSgl_I_NAME> out of the <DefSgl_BAG> and puts <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> in with <DefSgl_TARGET>'s belongings.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_HandoverImportant.Text: Probably best to keep hold of <DefSgl_I_NAME>.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_ExchangeCancel.Text: You decided not to move <DefSgl_I_NAME> after all.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_ReplaceSelect.Text: What do you want to move?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_CurseLift.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_I_NAME> is cursed, and cannot be removed!

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_SelectAccessorie.Text: Choose where you want to equip <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(these,this)>.<NO_INPUT>

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_ShowNone.Text: But you'll need a merchant in your party if you want to appraise any items!

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_DumpCanNot.Text:
You can't possibly discard that!
It's far too important!

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_DumpLare.Text: If you throw <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(those,that)> away, you may never find <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(their,its)> like again. Are you sure?

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_DumpEquip.Text:
<Cap><DefSgl_I_NAME> <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(are,is)> currently equipped.
Are you sure you want to discard <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)>?

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_DumpCancel.Text: You decided not to discard <IfSing_VALUE(<DefSgl_I_NAME>,<DefPlr_I_NAME>)> after all.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_EquipOwner.Text: <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(They are,This is)> currently in <DefSgl_WORD>'s possession. Do you want to give <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> to <DefSgl_ACTOR> and have <IfGender_ACTOR(him,her,it)> equip <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> instead?

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_EquipRental.Text: You can't change your equipment right now.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_EquipEquipper.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_WORD> currently has <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(those,this)> equipped. Do you want to give <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> to <DefSgl_ACTOR> and have <IfGender_ACTOR(him,her,it)> equip <IfPlrNoun_I_NAME(them,it)> instead?

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_EquipInventoryMax_.Text: Would you like to sort {ACTOR}'s inventory?

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_EquipNothing.Text: <DefSgl_ACTOR> isn't carrying any items that can be equipped in this slot.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_EquipAuto.Text: {ACTOR} changes <IfGender_ACTOR(his,her,their)> equipment to something a bit better.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_EquipAutoFailed.Text: {ACTOR} already has the best equipment there is!

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_MemoryDeleteResult.Text: The memory fades from your mind.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_BattleMagic.Text: Sadly, that spell can't be used outside of battle.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_MagicNotenoughMP.Text: <DefSgl_ACTOR> tries to cast {WORD}. But <IfGender_ACTOR(he,she,it)> doesn't have enough MP!

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_MagicUseDeath.Text: <DefSgl_ACTOR> has fallen in battle and can't cast any spells.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_MagicUseParalysis.Text: <DefSgl_ACTOR> is paralysed and can't cast any spells.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_MagicUseConfusion.Text: <DefSgl_ACTOR> is confused and can't use any spells.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_BattleSkill.Text: Sadly, that ability can't be used outside of battle.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_SkillNotenoughMP.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_ACTOR> tries to use {WORD}. But <IfGender_ACTOR(he,she,it)> doesn't have enough MP!

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_SkillUseDeath.Text: <DefSgl_ACTOR> has fallen in battle and can't use any abilities.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_SkillUseParalysis.Text: <DefSgl_ACTOR> is paralysed and can't use any abilities.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_SkillUseConfusion.Text: <DefSgl_ACTOR> is confused and can't use any abilities.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_MiscLineupImpossib.Text: The party's line-up can't be changed at the moment.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_MiscTextOptionConf.Text: Swap the confirm and cancel buttons?
Swap the confirm and cancel buttons?
Swap the confirm and cancel buttons?
Swap the confirm and cancel buttons?

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_MiscTextOptionNoti.Text: Changing the text language may cause certain terms such as character names to display incorrectly. If this happens, please revert to your original settings.
Depending on the settings you choose, there may be discrepancies between voiced lines and subtitles.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_Suspend.Text:
Your progress will be saved in an adventure log and you will be returned to the title screen.
Are you sure?

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_Suspend_Overwrite.Text: Your current quick save log will be overwritten. Are you sure?

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_Back_To_Title1.Text: This is your most recent adventure log.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_Back_To_Title2.Text: If you stop adventuring now, any progress you've not recorded in an adventure log will be lost.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_Back_To_Title3.Text: Are you sure you wish to return to the title screen?

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_BlockSave.Text: You can't do that right now.

Txt_FieldMenu_Message_BlockLental.Text: Sadly, there's no one you can use that on right now.

Txt_FieldMenu_Memory_Popup_SUCCESS.Text: All that you just heard has been committed to memory.

Txt_FieldMenu_Memory_Popup_SUCCESS_IN_EV.Text: All that you just heard has been committed to memory.

Txt_FieldMenu_Memory_Popup_ALREADY_MEMOR.Text: These wise words already hold a place in your memory.

Txt_FieldMenu_Memory_Popup_MEMORY_FILL.Text: You've just filled up your memory bank.

Txt_FieldMenu_Memory_Popup_NOT_ENOUGH_SL.Text: Oh dear. There's no space in your head for new memories.

Txt_FieldMenu_Memory_Popup_ALREADY_MEMOR.Text: All that you just heard has already been committed to memory.

Txt_FieldMenu_King_Message_ITEM.Text: Don't be silly! A king would never stoop to carrying his possessions around himself!

Txt_FieldMenu_King_Message_EQUIP.Text: Careful now! His Majesty is rather fond of his current attire.

Txt_FieldMenu_King_Message_MEMORY.Text: How presumptuous of you! A king would never squander his time reminiscing!

Txt_FieldMenu_King_Message_MAGIC.Text: How perfectly ridiculous! Who ever heard of a king stooping to common magic tricks?

Txt_FieldMenu_King_Message_SKILL.Text: Are you suggesting His Majesty is some lowly court jester?

Txt_FieldMenu_King_Message_MAXHEAL.Text: That will be wholly unnecessary<--->His Majesty's royal person remains free from injury.

Txt_FieldMenu_King_Message_ALMOSTHEAL.Text: That will be wholly unnecessary<--->His Majesty's royal person remains free from injury.

Txt_FieldMenu_King_Message_ATATUS.Text: His Majesty reads all about how strong and heroic he was back in his adventuring days.

Txt_FieldMenu_King_Message_SORT.Text: His Majesty attempts to change the party's line-up...<KEY_WAIT>...before realising he's all alone.

Txt_FieldMenu_King_Message_STRATEGY.Text: His Majesty begins making a battle plan...<KEY_WAIT>...but he has no one to share it with.

Txt_FieldMenu_King_Message_WARP.Text: There's no need for His Majesty to leave Romaria. Who would be king in his stead?

Txt_FieldMenu_Queen_Message_ITEM.Text: Don't be silly! A queen would never stoop to carrying her possessions around herself!

Txt_FieldMenu_Queen_Message_EQUIP.Text: Careful now! Her Majesty is rather fond of her current attire.

Txt_FieldMenu_Queen_Message_MEMORY.Text: How presumptuous of you! A queen would never squander her time reminiscing!

Txt_FieldMenu_Queen_Message_MAGIC.Text: How perfectly ridiculous! Who ever heard of a queen stooping to common magic tricks?

Txt_FieldMenu_Queen_Message_SKILL.Text: Are you suggesting Her Majesty is some lowly court jester?

Txt_FieldMenu_Queen_Message_MAXHEAL.Text: That will be wholly unnecessary<--->Her Majesty's royal person remains free from injury.

Txt_FieldMenu_Queen_Message_ALMOSTHEAL.Text: That will be wholly unnecessary<--->Her Majesty's royal person remains free from injury.

Txt_FieldMenu_Queen_Message_ATATUS.Text: Her Majesty reads all about how strong and heroic she was back in her adventuring days.

Txt_FieldMenu_Queen_Message_SORT.Text: Her Majesty attempts to change the party's line-up...<KEY_WAIT>...before realising she's all alone.

Txt_FieldMenu_Queen_Message_STRATEGY.Text: Her Majesty begins making a battle plan...<KEY_WAIT>...but she has no one to share it with.

Txt_FieldMenu_Queen_Message_WARP.Text: There's no need for Her Majesty to leave Romaria. Who would be queen in her stead?
